caption: Kernel Extension Activity
description: Kernel Extension events report when a driver/extension is loaded or unloaded into the kernel
name: kernel_extension

1.caption: Load
1.description: A driver/extension was loaded into the kernel

2.caption: Unload
2.description: A driver/extension was unloaded (removed) from the kernel

actor.description: The actor process that loaded or unloaded the driver/extension.
